text: Javier Portales (Miguel Ángel Álvarez; 21 April 1937 - 14 October 2003) was an Argentine actor with work in television, movie and theater. He was known for his role in the 1962 movie Una Jaula no tiene secretos. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Argentine actors Category:Argentine comedians
title: Javier Portales
